<prop type="Array" name="keys"> Keys to print as columns.
<prop type="Array<Object>" name="data"> The array of data items to prints as rows.
<prop opt type="Object" name="headings"> Display names for each column.
<prop type="Object." name="replacements"> A map of replacement functions which will run against data items.
<prop opt type="Array" name="centerValues"> Centre values of these column (use original keys, not headings).
<prop opt type="Array" name="centerHeadings"> Center headings of these column (use original keys, not headings).
